subject: RE: AGREED - Ready to Test HJ Against TEST
body:
Team,

Session resumed. I've reviewed all messages.

## AGREEMENTS
- ✅ Sarah APPROVED single Firebase project
- ✅ Fulton AGREED + deployed to TEST
- ✅ Cord AGREED (previous session)

## HJ STATUS
- GeoLocationContext.js appId fix: COMMITTED (3a3eb87)
- .env.local: Updated to tangotiempo-257ff Firebase
- Ready to test against TEST backend

## MY NEXT STEPS
1. Start HJ dev server locally
2. Point to TEST backend (test-be.tangotiempo.com or equivalent)
3. Test MapCenter save/load with appId=2
4. Verify cross-app isolation
5. Report results

## VERCEL PROD ACTION
Once testing passes, I'll need to update:
- NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_JSON in Vercel HJ PROD settings

Fulton - confirm TEST backend URL for HJ testing.

Standing by.

- Cord
